about_the_game:
KINTSUGI is a game inspired by the medieval Japanese art of repairing ceramics, which transforms cracks into decorative elements, highlighting their beauty with gold. The goal is to assemble broken vessels from fragments, like a three-dimensional puzzle.

Demo has 6 pots to break and repair. 5 of them are for free, last one is "payed" with in-game only "piece" currency. No microtransactions, you earn money by playing - period.
In final game pots will be cheaper, promise ! :) 
In final game there will be two more difficulty modes, which will allow earn more "pieces" for each pot.
Also there will be 3 more places where "assembly table" will be place, but they will be in the same area.
